artist: Artist: after Pablo Picasso; Author: Preface by Jaime Sabartès; Colorist: Daniel Jacomet et Cie, Paris; Publisher: Au Vent d'Arles, Paris
description: Portfolio of 8 text leaves and 12 reproductions of watercolros and pastels, with one original etching (P.13,983), housed in a folding blue cloth box with pochoir-illustrated upper cover

medium: Offset color lithographs heightened with pochoir
title: Les Bleus de Barcelone
